elements.title: Angel of Long Point
elements.contents: ... that the Angel of Long Point (pictured) saved seventeen lives across five different incidents?

elements.title: water buffalo
elements.contents: ... that Aboriginal Australians who first saw herds of water buffalo interpreted the new animals as a manifestation of their dreaming?

elements.title: Carl Borgmann
elements.contents: ... that the departure of Carl Borgmann from the University of Vermont ended 17 years of scientists serving consecutive terms as president?

elements.title: Lyttelton Gaol
elements.contents: ... that the walls of the former Lyttelton Gaol are archaeologically significant as one of the first uses of concrete in New Zealand?

elements.title: Aileen Davies
elements.contents: ... that Aileen Davies sang roles on the first two D'Oyly Carte Opera Company recordings using the new electrical-recording technology?

elements.title: Kikwit
elements.contents: ... that the city of Kikwit, estimated to have a population of more than one million, had only four paved roads in 2023?

elements.title: Ed McCann
elements.contents: ... that Ed McCann chose a career in civil engineering after being dissuaded from other branches of engineering by their military applications?

elements.title: Naboth Manzongo
elements.contents: ... that, after moving to Canada to work as a priest, Naboth Manzongo did not see his wife and children in Zimbabwe for three years due to COVID-19–related processing delays?

elements.title: Pink Floyd
elements.contents: ... that Pink Floyd escaped from its enclosure at the Sedgwick County Zoo in 2005, but continued to be spotted in Texas as late as 2023?
